backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Creator Studio backend, handling video upload/retrieval, thumbnail upload, user profiles, and follower functionality with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state by adding a nullable `thumbnail` field to all existing Video records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three thumbnail-related features (upload, VideoCard display, VideoPlayer poster) to their implementing files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point importing Tailwind and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app at `#root` and loading the TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for feed, video player, profile, and upload pages, and conditionally renders the ProfileSetupModal for new users.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper component that renders the NavigationBar, a centered main content area, and a footer with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate icons and disabled state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Sticky top navigation bar with links to Videos, Profile, and an Upload Video button shown only to authenticated users, plus the LoginButton.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter a display name and saves it via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation.
frontend/src/components/UploadSuccessMod: Confirmation modal displayed after a successful video upload, offering a button to navigate to the video feed.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: A card component that displays a video's thumbnail, title, description, view count, and upload date, and navigates to the video page on click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including listing/getting videos, user profiles, admin checks, follow/unfollow operations, and video/thumbnail uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: A profile page that displays the creator's info, video count, follower count, and allows authenticated non-creator users to follow/unfollow the creator, persisting the creator's principal in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/UploadVideoPage.tsx: A video upload page that validates video duration (10â€“20 seconds), accepts an optional thumbnail, and submits the video and thumbnail to the backend with progress feedback.
frontend/src/pages/VideoFeedPage.tsx: Displays a responsive grid of video cards fetched via `useListVideos`, showing skeletons while loading and an empty-state message if no videos exist.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Renders a full video player for a single video fetched by ID, including title, upload date, view count, description, and optional thumbnail as the video poster.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended typography/container-query/animate plugins, and custom font families and keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording existing thumbnail-related features (upload input, VideoCard display, player poster) and pending backend work to add an optional thumbnail blob field and upload endpoint.
